SEARCH
Package database

Class UserDB

java.lang.Object
database.UserDB
public class UserDB extends Object
The UserDB class represents an in-memory database for managing users, including students and staff. It provides methods for adding, removing, updating, and retrieving user information. This class follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure a single instance is used throughout the application.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserDB getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the UserDB class.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of UserDB.

    • populateUserMap

      public void populateUserMap(boolean isStudent)
      Populates the user map with data from the corresponding file.
      Parameters:
      isStudent - true if populating student map, false for staff map.

    • prettyPrintUserMap

      public void prettyPrintUserMap(Map<String,User> userMap)
      Prints a formatted representation of the user map for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      userMap - The user map to be printed.

    • getFacultyEnum

      public Faculty getFacultyEnum(String facultyString)
      Converts a faculty string to the corresponding Faculty enum.
      Parameters:
      facultyString - The string representation of the faculty.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Faculty enum.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user, boolean isStudent)
      Adds a user to the user map, either in the student or staff map based on the parameter.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be added.
      isStudent - true if adding a student, false for staff.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(String userID, boolean isStudent)
      Removes a user from the user map, either in the student or staff map based on the parameter.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to be removed.
      isStudent - true if removing a student, false for staff.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String userID, boolean isStudent)
      Retrieves a user from the user map, either in the student or staff map based on the parameter.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to be retrieved.
      isStudent - true if retrieving a student, false for staff.
      Returns:
      The user object or null if not found.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String userID, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a user in the user map. The user can be either a student or staff member.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose password is to be updated.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise.
